CustomField.formula: IF(Billing_Address__r.Location_Name__c!=null,' '+Billing_Address__r.Location_Name__c,'')+ IF(Billing_Address__r.Street_Name__c!=null,' '+Billing_Address__r.Street_Name__c,'')+ IF( TEXT(Billing_Address__r.Tipo_de_Zona__c)!= null,' '+TEXT(Billing_Address__r.Tipo_de_Zona__c),'')+ IF( TEXT(Billing_Address__r.Address_Number__c)!=null,' '+TEXT(Billing_Address__r.Address_Number__c),'')+ IF( Billing_Address__r.Piso__c!=null,' '+Billing_Address__r.Piso__c,'')+ IF( Billing_Address__r.Departamento__c!=null,' '+Billing_Address__r.Departamento__c,'')+ IF(Billing_Address__r.Entre_calle_rio_1__c!=null,' '+Billing_Address__r.Entre_calle_rio_1__c,'')+ IF(Billing_Address__r.Entre_calle_rio_2__c!=null,' '+Billing_Address__r.Entre_calle_rio_2__c,'')+ IF(Billing_Address__r.ZIP_Code__c!=null,' '+Billing_Address__r.ZIP_Code__c,'')
CustomField.label: NewBillingAddress
